alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 4:35PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT, CHARLESTON AND COLLETON COUNTIES... At 435 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Bennetts Point, or 13 miles northeast of Beaufort, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Edisto Beach, Johns Island, Seabrook Island, Meggett, Rockville, Bennetts Point, Yonges Island, and Edisto Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
